file.name: Payments-v2.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.2
info:
  title: Payments-v1
  version: 1.0.0
paths:
  /payments:
    post:
      summary: Post method is used to send fast payments
      description: |-
        creditOrDebit=DR field determines if the the customer wants to send payment.
        creditOrDebit=CR field determines if the the customer wants to request payment.
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/payments'
            examples:
              payments:
                value: |-
                  [
                      {
                          "debtorAccountNumber": "123456789",
                          "amount": "10.00",
                          "receiverFirstName": "Liz",
                          "receiverLastName": "Spangler",
                          "receiverEmail": "abc@redhat.com",
                          "receiverCellPhone": 7326628053
                      }
                  ]
        required: true
      responses:
        201:
          description: Payments created
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/payments'
              examples:
                payments:
                  value: |-
                  [
                      {
                          "debtorAccountNumber": "123456789",
                          "amount": "10.00",
                          "receiverFirstName": "Liz",
                          "receiverLastName": "Spangler",
                          "receiverEmail": "abc@redhat.com",
                          "receiverCellPhone": 7326628053
                      }
                  ]
  /transactions:
    get:
      responses:
        200:
          description: Successful
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/transactions'
              examples:
                transactions:
                  value: |-
                    [
                        {
                            "transId": "1",
                            "reciverOrSenderName": "Liz Spangler",
                            "amount": 39.92,
                            "status": "Successful",
                            "creditOrDebit": "DR"
                        },
                        {
                            "transId": "2",
                            "reciverOrSenderName": "Justin Goldsmith",
                            "amount": 63.65,
                            "status": "Pending",
                            "creditOrDebit": "CR"
                        }
                    ]
components:
  schemas:
    payments:
      description: Payments
      type: array
      items:
        type: object
        required:
        - debtorAccountNumber
        - amount
        - receiverFirstName
        - receiverLastName
        properties:
          debtorAccountNumber:
            type: string
          amount:
            type: number
            format: currency
          receiverFirstName:
            type: string
          receiverLastName:
            type: string
          receiverEmail:
            type: string
          receiverCellPhone:
            format: int64
            type: integer
    transactions:
      description: Transactions
      type: array
      items:
        $ref: '#/components/schemas/debitTransaction'
    debitTransaction:
        type: object
        required:
        - transId
        - receiverFirstName
        - receiverLastName
        - amount
        - status
        properties:
          transId:
            type: string
          receiverFirstName:
            type: string
          receiverLastName:
            type: string
          amount:
            type: number
            format: currency
          status:
            description: Successful or Failed
            type: string

Error: yaml: line 42: could not find expected ':'
